projects.name: Occupational Structure in the U.S. Labor Market
projects.summary: Using large-scale LinkedIn data to map and predict occupational mobility.
highlights: Developed scalable Python pipelines that processed 200M+ LinkedIn profiles, applying NLP techniques to clean text and map self-reported job titles to official SOC occupation codes.
Trained models on 120M+ individual career sequences to predict occupation switching, uncovering key demographic and skill correlates of mobility.

highlights: Analyzed data on 10k+ Hollywood actors, producers, and musicians.
